pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detect and Parse Historic Dates // Automatically converts language-specific verbal information, e.g., "1st half of the 19th century," to its standardized numerical counterparts, e.g., "1801-01-01/1850-12-31." It follows the recommendations of the 'MIDAS' ('Marburger Informations-, Dokumentations- und Administrations-System'), see doi:10.11588/artdok.00003770.
